T01D1152:194a-1: bha ga w'an sh'akya mu ni sto tra /
T01D1152:194a-3: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i bstod pa /
T01D1152:194a-4: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01D1152:194a-5: 'jig rten 'das pa 'jig rten sgron me mdzad //
T01D1152:194a-6: khyod ni 'jig rten don mdzad blo gros bzang //
T01D1152:194a-7: snang ba brnyes shing nyon mongs dri bsal ba //
T01D1152:194a-8: 'jig rten snang mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01D1152:194a-9: sbyin la dgyes shing stobs bcu'i mchog mnga' ba //
T01D1152:194a-10: gdul bya 'dul bzhin gdul bya'i pha rol byon //
T01D1152:194a-11: bcom ldan lha dang mi dang klus mchod pa //
T01D1152:194a-12: gdul bya'i mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01D1152:194a-13: mtshan mchog 'gro ba mang po'i don mdzad cing //
T01D1152:194a-14: 'dom gang 'od ni gser gyi kha dog 'dra //
T01D1152:194a-15: dge ba mtshan gyi dam pa'i gzugs mnga' ba //
T01D1152:194a-16: srid gsum mtshungs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01D1152:194b-0: pha rol gshegs @194b pas gzhan gyi tshogs rdzogs shing //
T01D1152:194b-1: pha rol phas rgol tshogs 'joms mi g-yo ba //
T01D1152:194b-2: sems can gzhan gyi sems dang spyod la mkhas //
T01D1152:194b-3: pha rol tshogs 'joms khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01D1152:194b-4: dgra bcom rgyal po nyon bcil dri bsal ba //
T01D1152:194b-5: 'tsho ba dag cing brtul zhugs tshul khrims gnas //
T01D1152:194b-6: lha yi lha mchog dri med dri bral ba //
T01D1152:194b-7: thugs rje mchog ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01D1152:194b-8: chu bo bzhi brgal bden bzhi'i bka' mchid gsung //
T01D1152:194b-9: mig sbyin bdud rtsi chos kyi bka' mchid can //
T01D1152:194b-10: mnyam thugs 'gro ba kun la byams pa'i thugs //
T01D1152:194b-11: chos la mnyam gnas mi rnams kha lo sgyur //
T01D1152:194b-12: yon tan mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01D1152:194b-13: snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs rnam par dag dang ldan //
T01D1152:194b-14: tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs lta bur snyan pa'i gsung //
T01D1152:194b-15: thams cad dbyangs kyi yan lag gsung tshul rdzogs //
T01D1152:194b-16: bden pa snyan gsung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01D1152:194b-17: stong pa mtshan ma med cing smon dang bral //
T01D1152:194b-18: zab mo blta dka' shin tu rtogs par dka' //
T01D1152:194b-19: thar la 'jug par mkhas pa'i blo gros can //
T01D1152:194b-20: thar pa'i lam dgyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01D1152:194b-21: rgyu la brten pa'i mkhas pa blo gros can //
T01D1152:194b-22: mtha' gnyis lta ba rtag tu mi mkhas pa //
T01D1152:194b-23: las kyi 'bras bu rnam smin kho nar gsung //
T01D1152:194b-24: lta ba'i mun bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01D1152:194b-25: gang nas ma byon gang du'ang gshegs ma lags //
T01D1152:194b-26: rtag tu dben pa'i chos rnams rab gsung ba //
T01D1152:194b-27: smig rgyu sgyu bzhin nga yir mi mnga' ba //
T01D1152:194b-28: dge ba'i chos tshul khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01D1152:194b-29: skye dang mi skye gang du skyes ma lags //
T01D1152:194b-30: skye dang 'jig dang gang du mi gsal ba //
T01D1152:194b-31: chos kyi gnas nyid ji ltar gnas la gnas //
T01D1152:194b-32: gnas dang mi gnas rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01D1152:194b-33: de bzhin kho na ba bzhin yang dag gsung //
T01D1152:194b-34: rtag tu mi g-yo de bzhin nyid la bzhugs //
T01D1152:194b-35: ri rab rdo rje rgyal mtshan 'dra ba'i sku //
T01D1152:194b-36: mi g-yo ri rab mtshungs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01D1152:194b-37: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i bstod pa slob dpon
